turret.buffer module¶

class turret.buffer.InferenceBuffer¶

Bases: object

An object of input and output buffers for the network.

batch_size¶
dimensions()¶

Getting dimensions of data on buffer.

Parameters:name (str) – Buffer name on the network.
Returns:dimensions of data.
Return type:tuple
get()¶

Getting data from buffer.

Parameters:name (str) – Buffer name on the network.
Returns:Data got from buffer.
Return type:np.ndarray
get_device_memory()¶

Getting a cuda memory for the buffer data.

Parameters:name (str) – Buffer name on the network.
Returns:A cuda memory for the buffer data.
Return type:binary
put()¶

Putting data on buffer.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – Buffer name on the network.
  • batch (np.ndarray) – Data to put on buffer.
swap()¶

Swapping data on buffer.

Parameters:
  • a (str) – Buffer name on the network to swap.
  • b (str) – Buffer name on the network to swap.

class turret.engine.BindingSet¶

Bases: object

A set of binding informations for network inputs and outputs.

class turret.engine.ExecutionContext¶

Bases: object

Context for executing inference using an engine. Multiple execution contexts may exist for one InferenceEngine instance, allowing the same engine to be used for the execution of multiple batches simultaneously.

create_buffer()¶

Returns InferenceBuffer for this context.

Returns:InferenceBuffer for this context.
Return type:turret.InferenceBuffer
enqueue()¶

Asynchronously execute inference on a batch.

Parameters:
  • buf (InferenceBuffer) – InferenceBuffer for this context.
  • stream (CUDA stream) – A cuda stream on which the inference kernels will be enqueued.
execute()¶

Synchronously execute inference on a batch.

Parameters:buf (InferenceBuffer) – InferenceBuffer for this context.
class turret.engine.InferenceEngine¶

Bases: object

An engine for executing inference on a built network.

bindings¶
max_batch_size¶

The maximum batch size.

nlayers¶

The number of layers in the network.

serialize()¶

Serialize the network to a stream.

Parameters:stream (binary stream) – A stream to write serialized engine.
workspace_size¶

The size of workspace in bytes.

class turret.engine.InferenceEngineBuilder¶

Bases: object

A builder for constructing inference engines.

average_find_iterations¶

The number of minimization iterations in minimization.

build()¶

Build an inference engine.

Parameters:network (turret.NetworkDefinition) – The network definition.
Returns:The constructed inference engine.
Return type:turret.InferenceEngine
create_network()¶

Create an empty network definition.

Parameters:dtype (turret.DataType, optional) – The data type for inference. Default to DataType.FLOAT.
Returns:The empty network definition.
Return type:turret.NetworkDefinition
debug_sync¶

The debug sync flag.

int8_calibrator¶

INT8 calibration interface.

max_batch_size¶

The maximum batch size.

max_workspace_size¶

The maximum workspace size in bytes.

min_find_iterations¶

The number of minimization iterations in averaging.

platform_has_fast_fp16()¶

Returns True when the platform has fast native fp16.

platform_has_fast_int8()¶

Returns True when the platform has fast native int8.

class turret.engine.InferenceRuntime¶

Bases: object

A runtime to allow a serialized engine to be deserialized.

deserialize_engine()¶

Deserialize the network using a stream.

Parameters:
  • stream (binary stream) – A stream to read serialized engine.
  • plugin_factory (turret.PluginFactory, optional) – The plugin factory. Default to None.
Returns:

Deserialized InferenceEngine.
Return type:

turret.InferenceEngine

Type:turret.DataType

Type:turret.DataType

HALF = <DataType.HALF: 1>
INT32 = <DataType.INT32: 3>
INT8 = <DataType.INT8: 2>

NumPy data-type for this type.

size¶

Number of bytes consumed by an element of this type.

Bases: object

Make descriptor for 2D spatial data with channels.

static HW()¶

Make descriptor for 2D spatial data.

static NCHW()¶

Make descriptor for 2D spatial data with channels and indices.

Tuple of dimensions.

size¶

Number of elements.

class turret.foundational.Weights¶

Bases: object

An array of weights used as a layer parameter.

Parameters:
  • values (numpy.ndarray) – The weight values.
  • dtype (data-type) – The type of the weights. values.dtype will be used as it when dtype is None.

turret.graph module¶

class turret.graph.NetworkDefinition¶

Bases: object

A network definition.

add_constant()¶

Add an constant input to the networks.

Parameters:
  • weights (np.ndarray) – The input values.
  • dims (Dimensions, optional) – The dimensions of this input. Default to None.
Returns:

The tensor that is added by this operation.
Return type:

turret.Tensor
add_input()¶

Add an input tensor to the network.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – The name of the input tensor.
  • type (turret.DataType) – The data type of the input tensor.
  • dims (turret.Dimensions) – The dimensions of the input tensor.
  • broadcast_across_batch (bool, optional) – Whether to enable broadcast of tensor accross the batch. Default to False.
Returns:

The tensor that is added by this operation.
Return type:

turret.Tensor
add_plugin()¶

Add an plugin layer to the networks.

Parameters:plugin (turret.Plugin) – The layer plugin.
add_resource()¶

Add an resource(ex. weights, bias, etc.) to the networks.

Parameters:resource (turret.Tensor) – an resource.
dtype¶
input_bindings¶

Get binding informations of input tensors.

mark_output()¶

Mark an tensor as an output of the network.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – The name of the output tensor.
  • tensor (turret.Tensor) – The tensor that will be marked as an output.
weight_type¶

Get data type for weights.

class turret.graph.Tensor¶

Bases: object

A tensor in a network definition.

broadcast_across_batch¶

Returns True if this tensor is broadcast across the batch.

dimensions¶

Get the dimensions of the tensor.

is_network_input¶

Returns True if this tensor is a network input.

is_network_output¶

Returns True if this tensor is a network output.

network¶
type¶

Get the data type of the tensor.

turret.logger module¶

class turret.logger.Logger¶

Bases: object

Application-implemented logging interface for the builder, engine and runtime.

log¶

A callback implemented by the application to handle logging messages.

Parameters:
  • severity (Severity) – The severity of the message.
  • message (str) – The log message.
class turret.logger.LoggerProxy¶

Bases: object

class turret.logger.Severity¶

Bases: object

The severity corresponding to a log message.

INTERNAL_ERROR¶

An internal error has occurred. Execution is unrecoverable.

Type:turret.Severity
ERROR¶

An application error has occurred.

Type:turret.Severity
WARNING¶

An application error has been discovered, but TensorRT has recovered or fallen back to a default.

Type:turret.Severity
INFO¶

Informational messages.

Type:turret.Severity
ERROR = <Severity.ERROR: 1>
INFO = <Severity.INFO: 3>
INTERNAL_ERROR = <Severity.INTERNAL_ERROR: 0>
WARNING = <Severity.WARNING: 2>

Convert the data type of Numpy to it of Turret.

Parameters:dtype – The data type of Numpy.
Returns:The data type of Turret.
Return type:turret.DataType
